javax.microedition.io
Interface InputConnection

All Superinterfaces:
Connection
All Known Subinterfaces:
ContentConnection, FileConnection, HttpConnection, SocketConnection, StreamConnection
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionBaseAdapter, Protocol, Protocol, Protocol, Protocol
public interface InputConnection
extends Connection

This interface defines the capabilities that an input stream connection must have.

Since:
CLDC 1.0
Version:
12/17/01 (CLDC 1.1)
